name: Golf Tracker
author: Buddy Lindsey

sections.installation:
Preferred way to install is via plugin search built into wordpress
Automagical Install:
1. In the ‘Plugins’ menu in worpdress click ‘Add New’
2. Search for ‘golf-tracker’
3. Click install
4. Activate the plugin

Manual:
1. Unzip golf-tracker.zip
2. Upload contents into to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this work on older versions of wordpress?

It might. I have only tested with versions 3.1 and up. Please feel free to try and let me know.
sections.changelog:
=Version 0.7 =
Features:
*Track golf games and display them in a nice pretty table
*Manage rounds of golf and golf courses you have played at

Known Issues:
*The handicap feature doesn’t work
*Editing a golf course has some wierd display issues on some installs, but does work.
sections.description:
Track your golf game and other aspects of how you play, and show the things you track to your readers.

Arbitrary section
